name: Pizza Place! :)
description:
You're hungry, so you decide to try out the new pizza place (called Pizza Place!) by your house. 

Toppings are chosen at random,  and change every time you play, so you may want to play a few times to see what options you can get!

The customers are also randomized, and they will say something new (depending on what toppings you get). There's also a JACKPOT topping order that is pretty rare! I wonder if anyone will find it.

Made for January's Bitsy Game Jam. Theme: You Can't Have it All
